Human: How would someone from Vietnam answer the following question:

Here are the options:
(A) Being tough with China
(B) Having a strong relationship with China
(C) Being tough with China on territorial disputes
(D) Having a strong economic relationship with China
(E) DK/Refused

(B) Disapprove
